title: C-Suite Strategic Advisory & Transformation Framework
context: Over 7 years of experience partnering with CxOs to shape and execute IT strategies through proprietary transformation frameworks.
highlights: Developed a Transformation Framework to align IT initiatives with client business objectives, simplifying decision-making for investment planning.
Defined the vision and implementation strategy for Enterprise Automation and Observability Platforms, aligned with ROI goals.
Invited by the Client CTO to present a 5-year technology strategy at their global workshop in San Francisco.

title: Global ODC Operations & Workforce Scaling
context: Leadership of global, distributed teams (450+ associates) and massive infrastructure operations.
highlights: Directed enterprise IT hosting and network operations supporting 60,000+ servers and 10,000+ business-critical applications.
Managed workforce strategy and people management for 450 associates across India, Philippines, and Puerto Rico.
Designed and executed global onshore-offshore workforce strategies to improve productivity, resilience, and cost efficiency.
Led end-to-end financial accountability for divisions, managing a $2M+ annual budget and $10M+ in cloud spend.

title: Large-Scale Azure Cloud Modernization (AVS & AVD)
context: Leading complex, large-scale cloud transformations for Fortune 50 organizations.
highlights: Spearheaded the migration of 1,000+ on-prem workloads to Azure VMware Solution (AVS).
Led the migration of Citrix environments (12,000+ users and 100s of virtualized apps) to Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD).
Managed planning and execution of strategic initiatives to migrate 500+ public endpoints from Azure to private endpoints.

title: Zero Trust Network Architecture & Micro-segmentation
context: Designing and implementing secure-by-design network architectures for enterprise resilience.
highlights: Designed and implemented Zero Trust Network Architecture with application micro-segmentation using Azure vWAN HUB.
Collaborated with client architects to re-architect global network flows (North-South/East-West) for high availability.
Integrated Zscaler solutions, FortiGate NGFW, and NSX firewalls into enterprise cloud ecosystems.

title: Executive Pursuit Leadership & Deal Shaping
context: Driving revenue growth through complex solution engineering and multi-tower pre-sales leadership.
highlights: Led 400+ pursuits, including 40 major global deals up to $200M TCV.
Successfully led a complex IT services contract renewal with a TCV of $50M.
Established pre-sales functions from the ground up, expanding customer footprints by 10x within 18 months.

title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) & SRE Maturity
context: Modernizing engineering practices to drive automation and operational speed.
highlights: Implemented and automated Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, Ansible, and CloudFormation.
Built CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Python, and Git/Gerrit to accelerate deployment cycles.
Developed data-driven frameworks to assess and prioritize IT initiatives against business goals.

title: Global Service Delivery & Account CTO Leadership
context: Executive oversight of IT service delivery, account profitability, and operational excellence.
highlights: Managed service delivery for 3,500+ global hosting customers across 65+ data centers worldwide.
Led multiple hostile transitions, stabilizing support operations and ensuring SLA compliance.
Introduced 'shift-left' and automation initiatives, improving L1 productivity and reducing higher-level support effort by 35%.

title: Data Center Consolidation & Tier-3 Build-out
context: Managing high-value physical and virtual infrastructure consolidation programs.
highlights: Led the build-out of two Tier-3 data centers in India to host SAP HANA Enterprise Cloud, a $10M solution.
Orchestrated DC consolidation initiatives for a Fortune 5 organization, addressing complex technical challenges.
Led IT infrastructure modernization projects with a budget of $20M for large EMEA accounts.

title: FinOps, IT Governance & Risk Management
context: Ensuring financial accountability and compliance across complex technology estates.
highlights: Led consulting engagements for implementing FinOps and Data Center consolidation assessments.
Oversaw DC, IAM, vulnerability management, and cybersecurity operations to safeguard enterprise services.
Served as an Architecture Advisory Board member to enhance governance and decision-making for CXOs.
